transcript:
Customer: Ji boliye.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ji boliye.

Executive: Good evening sir, main aapko IndiaMART team se.

Customer: Madam mera pehle kisi aur ka phone aaya ab aapka aaya.

Executive: Kya issue kya hai sir aapko?

Customer: Issue ye hai ki mujhe bewakoof jhooth bolte hue mujhe package de diya ab mujhse mujhe ek rupay ka usse koi fayda ya business nahi mila hai.

Customer: To aap mera package band kare mera paisa refund kar de anyatha main case bhi karunga social media aur whatsapp group pe dal dunga IndiaMART ki.

Executive: Aapko business haan.

Executive: Kya hua aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Meri aawaz aisi clear aa rahi hai ki aap mera paisa refund kar do bas.

Customer: Anyatha main aapka social media pe aur news me dalwa dunga ki ye company chor hai.

Executive: To sir refund karne ka reason kya hai aapko buyleads proper nahi aa rahi hai isliye bol rahe ho?

Customer: Haan ek rupay ka bhi business nahi mila ek rupay ka.

Executive: Aap pan India me deal karte hai?

Customer: Haan pan India me deal karte hai.

Executive: To phir aap buyleads daily basis pe consume kar rahe ho to buyleads jo bhi consume kar rahe ho usse kya baat hai.

Customer: Ek rupay ka bhi business nahi mila hai aapki IndiaMART se.

Executive: Thik hai haan to aapne jo sir aap sahi se baat kar lo.

Customer: Main aapse sahi se to baat kar raha hu aur kaise?

Customer: Main haath jod ke bol raha hu mera aap chilla kyu rahe ho?

Executive: Madam main chilla kaha raha hu main to aapse nivedan kar raha hu ki mera paisa refund kara do mere ko aapke sath ab kaam nahi karna.

Customer: Aapki company ne mujhe jhooth bol ke jo aapke salesman the Rakesh ji ne jhooth bol ke ek minute ruko main abhi ek minute ruko.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan boliye.

Executive: Sir refund ka policy nahi hai hamare paas aap problem batao apne account manager se wo bhi discuss karte hai kya issue aa raha hai par refund nahi ho payega sir.

Customer: Refund nahi ho payega to main aapka hai na newspaper aur social media pe dalunga kyuki aapki company chor hai farziwada karti hai jhooth bolti hai aur jo bhole bhale ek minute aap ruk jao main apne senior manager se aapki connect karwati hu ye call unko forward karti hu haan bol dijiye.

[silence]

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ji boliye.

Executive: Main Shri Gopal ji baat kar raha hu very good evening haan ji good evening boliye yes sir main six number pe aapne call kiya tha Udita is new here so that's all direct connect hua hai senior se to aap bata sakte hai kya help kar sakte hai kya problem aa rahi hai.

Customer: Sir problem ye aa rahi hai ki mere ko abhi tak ek rupay ka bhi business nahi mila aur aapke salesman ne jhooth bol ke mere ko ye package de diya jo mere koi kaam ka nahi hai abhi tak ek rupay ka business nahi mila koi buyleads nahi milti sab bewakoof hai farziwada hai aap mera paisa refund kar dijiye itna nivedan hai mera sir.

Customer: Salesman ne kya bola nahi to main social media pe nahi to main social media pe aur news pe ye dalwa dunga sure hai.

Customer: Kyuki ye bhole bhale bhole bhale customer ko bewakoof bana rahi hai jhooth bol rahi hai farziwadi ka farzi company hai ye.

Executive: Aapko bola kya gaya tha batayenge please hum.

Customer: Hame ye bola gaya tha ki aapko roz kam se kam ye 10 buyleads milegi.

Customer: Thik hai kya aap roz aapko buyleads milegi thik hai hame buyleads haan aaj tak ek buyleads bhi nahi mili hai aur koi buyleads agar dikh bhi jati hai to within second me gayab ho jati hai ye hame bataya nahi ki aapko us pe 24 ghante baithe rehna padega nazar rakhna padega nahi to wo buyleads aapko nahi milegi dusra le lete hai aur paanch jo log le lete hai pata nahi lagta kaun kisne le li kya hai.

Customer: Aaj tak hame buyleads nahi mili mera jitna bhi aap suniye aap pehle aap suniye main aapko suniye abhi tak aap dekh lo ki 11 buyleads milti hai aapke hafte ki main ek bhi consume nahi kara kya karunga.

Customer: Buyleads aapki hai aapne 15 tarikh ko ek lead uthaya tha.

Customer: Haan ji sir.

Customer: Main prayas kar raha hu par ek lead bhi mere ko convert nahi hai haan aawaz aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai convert hona different thing hai but buyleads nahi mile different thing hai na aap bole ki mujhe buyleads hi nahi mile to sahi baat hai mera hai bulk me business thik hai mera hai bulk me aur bulk me requirement aati nahi hai aur aati hai to within second me paanch buyleads khatam hoti hai phir milti nahi hai.

Executive: To hame ye baat batayi nahi buyleads ki baat kar raha hu jo aapne consume kiya hai sir jo aapne contact buyer now pe click kiya hai na us buyleads ki baat kar raha hu 15 tarikh ko aapne Kota Polystone ki Mr. Mehsul se ek lead consume kiya tha usse pehle aapne 14 tarikh ko 4000 square feet ki ek requirement thi us client ko connect kiya tha Sonipat se client ka Mr. Mohit usse pehle agar baat karu to quantity 5000 pieces high polished Kota Stone ki lead thi ye aapka G2 karke koi buyer ka tha ye bulk me inquiry thi mostly inquiry jo aapne consume kiya sir wo to bulk me hi thi retail me nahi thi.

Customer: Ek bhi ek bhi convert nahi kisi ko requirement hi nahi hai kisi ne dusra search kiya hai koi verify buyer hi nahi hai wo aap khud search kare sorry dekhiye.

Executive: Conversion ka Gopal ji jaha tak baat hai na business karna aap better jante hai sir humse hum aapko buyer la ke de sakte hai haan ye jarur ho sakta hai ki kuch buyleads aapki expire ho ja rahi hogi matlab ki within second me dusra buyer supplier consume kar le raha ho but aisa nahi ki bilkul hi aapko nahi mil rahi hai aapke jo hai sales team ne mujhe ye baat nahi batayi thi agar wo batata to main wo package hi nahi leta aapka.

Customer: Haan haan but aapko jitna jitna jitna buyleads ka aapko bola gaya tha ki weekly basis pe jitna mujhe bata rahe hai sir aapko kitna buyleads available hai sir aap de rahe ho aap mujhe sab pata hai are sir de rahe ho.

Customer: Par wo buyleads koi use hi nahi hui hai main kar hi nahi pa raha hu aapko refund karwane ki jaha tak available buyleads hai na sir ye main aapse ye bol raha hu unhone mujhe unhone mujhe ye nahi bataya tha ki aapki expire ho jayegi within second me bas mera question yahi hai sir.

Executive: Aapki buyleads sari expire thodi ho rahi hai aap IndiaMART portal kholiye main abhi aapko available buyleads dikha raha hu bulk me.

Customer: Main abhi check kar raha hu bulk me batao kitni hai mera minimum 10000 10000 square feet se upar chahiye bataiye isme koi hai kya bataiye kitne ki hai.

Executive: 10000 square feet kitna requirement amount kitna ban jata hoga 10000 square feet ka.

Customer: Kam se kam 3 lakh rupay.

Executive: Hmm batao isme ek minute rukiye.

[silence]

Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir.

Executive: To wo to aap khud sochiye na sir agar aap ek deal ko approach kar rahe ho 10000 square feet ki hogi jo 5 se 6 lakh rupay ki hogi aap khud dekhiye ki yaha pe aapne jo IndiaMART pe investment kiya hai aapka jo investment hai wo monthly basis pe kitna hai sir aapne 28000 plus GST IndiaMART ko diya hai divided by agar 12 karte ho to 2300 rupay mahine bhar ka aap 2300 rupay ka mahine bhar ka investment karke daily basis pe 10 se 12 buyleads aap khoj rahe ho ki mere ko itna value ka milega ye kahi pe possible wali cheez hai aap khud sochiye is cheez ko ek baar.

Customer: Are sir ek to milegi kam se kam.

Executive: Haan ek kyu nahi milegi main ek cheez ek cheez batao na aaj main aaj maine ek lead kya ek buyleads li hai maine aaj batao.

Executive: Aap ek baar zara IndiaMART open karenge loud speaker karke.

Customer: Maine kar li.

Executive: Aap buyleads me open karne ke baad sabse upar recent pe click kariye sir Kota Stone aapka main product hai na Kota wala.

Customer: Sir main recently open karta hu ye dekho main recently dekhta hu hamesha ye nahi aap recent pe click karne ke baad India location karke likha aa raha hoga usko click kariyega.

Customer: Main thik hai kar diya.

Executive: Thik hai ab aap yaha pe dekhiye sari lead aapko time ke sequence wise dikh rahi hai second number pe lead aa rahi hai 400 square feet ki uske niche Kota Stone slab ki requirement aa rahi hai 2200 square feet ki uske niche agar jaoge to 1500 square feet ki aapki Himachal se lead aa rahi hai grey Kota Stone ki uske agar niche agar aap jaoge mera recent nahi hai na.

Customer: Mera recent nahi hai sir.

Executive: Sir lekin 10000 square feet ekdam se nahi milega aapko.

Customer: Are sir pure hafte me to milegi ek inquiry.

Executive: Haan ek inquiry ka main mana nahi karunga lekin aap ye cheez agar aap to ek din ki bol rahe ho main pure hafte ki bol raha hu pure hafte me ek inquiry to milegi.

Executive: Haan haan bilkul sir aap ek kaam kar sakte hai aapko jo provide kiye na aap is way me guide kariyega daily basis pe use kariyega recent pe ja ke India me kar raha hu usi way me kar raha hu sir usi way me kar raha hu main pichle do teen mahine se main usi way me kar raha hu sir.

Executive: Hmm ek minute rukiye sir mujhe bataya nahi gaya tha mera question yahi hai ki aapki buyleads expire ho jati hai within second mujhe ye nahi bataya aapne aapne aapne ye problem starting me kyu nahi batayi ab aapko kitna time ho gaya India me kam se kam do mahine se main Rakesh ji ko phone laga raha hu phone hi nahi utha raha jo mujhe deke gaya salesman aapka.

Customer: Aapne 6 mahina ho gaya IndiaMART pe aaye hue 6 mahine se agar wo banda phone nahi utha raha hai to IndiaMART ka account manager aapse connect kar raha tha aapne wo cheez usko kyu nahi batayi are sir main aapke account manager ko bhi bata raha hu sir pichle 6 mahine se sabko bata raha hu main account manager ko bata raha hu aapke RSN ko bata raha hu sabko to bata raha hu ab main aur kya kar sakta hu ye batao.

Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir sabke haath jod raha hu refund to nahi kar sakte hai sir hum isme main refund to nahi kar sakta lekin isme support ye kar sakta hu ki kuch cheezo ko guide karu accordingly aap services ko utilize kariye are sir guide karte karte bhai 6 mahine nikal diye aapke unhone sabne guide hi kiya hai mujhe aaj tak aap bol rahe ho 6 mahine 6 mahine me sabne mujhe guide hi kiya hai.

Executive: Hmm agar aap mujhe mera paisa refund nahi karenge koi baat nahi sir phir aap mere se ye mat bolna ki maine aapko inform nahi kiya main social media whatsapp group aur sab pe dalunga taki mere ko jo nuksan hua hai wo kisi dusre ko nahi ho bechare ko.

Customer: Thik hai sir aap ek kaam kar lijiye mujhe 10 se 15 minute ka time dijiye main apni higher authority se ek baar discuss kar leta hu uske baad aapko call back karta hu jo bhi rehta hai final hum aapko inform kar dete hai waise refund ka mujhe kuch dikh nahi raha hai ki refund initiate kar payenge kyuki maine ye yahi baat sir aapki jo senior manager hai yaha pe jinone mujhe package diya Rakesh Sharma unko bhi maine yahi word bole unhone mera phone uthana band kar diya.

Executive: I don't know sir main kisi Rakesh Sharma ko nahi janta hu main IndiaMART ke Noida head office se baat kar raha hu ab yaha pe aapka mera call connect hua hai to main aapko aap mere hi number se aapko connect back karta hu aap baat kar lijiye 10 15 minute me hai na main kal hi pareshan ho gaya hu aapke IndiaMART se kal hi kaam karunga main soch liya maine thik hai okay sir thank you bata dijiye mujhe sure abhi jawab denge aap.

Customer: Haan haan aapke main aapse connect back karta hu Sunil naam hai mera kitni der me connect back karenge sir.

Executive: 10 se 15 minute me connect karta hu main intzaar karunga aapka.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to no business generated.

- Alleges salesman lied about buylead quantity.

- Claims buyleads expire too quickly.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund not possible.

- Senior executive offered guidance on service utilization.

- Executive will discuss with higher authority.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, salesman
